name: Monster Girl Incursion
description:
On a small island in the west of the kingdom, the residents have been fighting against more and more aggressive monsters recently and all other adventures have failed so far. Your unconventional fighting methods have already gained a reputation among the adventurers and the guild headquarters asked you to solve the emerging problem as a last resort.

Monster Girl Incursion combines simple and fun gameplay with cloth losing monster girls.
Fight against 24 different opponents, each with unique mechanics that mainly require reaction, cleverness and practice.
